title: Screenshots and saves
body:
Ok {{champion:33}}  so i have photo-shopped (paint, since i dont have Photoshop) an image and i want to download it onto LOL boards, is there anyway i can do that. Thx{{champion:154}} 
Also sorry if this is in the wrong board

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Danklight Vayne,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=omPPgsEt,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-27T03:32:15.182+0000)
>
> download puush, most reliable.

that or imgur.

RIOT just removed the button for uploading images a few days ago for 'security reasons'... (because uploading images is so deadly...) so the only way to do it now is to use a site like imgur and paste the link into the link section when you create a new discussion on the boards, real inconvenient but thats the way they want it done now.
